key_storylines.title: Title Credentials Test
key_storylines.description: Manchester City's title credentials are being tested after inconsistent start

key_storylines.title: Arsenal's Home Fortress
key_storylines.description: Arsenal have been dominant at Emirates with convincing wins over Leeds (5-0) and Nottingham Forest (3-0)

key_storylines.title: Haaland vs Arsenal Defense
key_storylines.description: Norwegian striker looking to continue his scoring streak against the Gunners

key_storylines.title: Injury Concerns
key_storylines.description: Both teams dealing with key player absences - Saka for Arsenal, multiple new signings for City

tactical_analysis.city_approach: Will look to control possession through midfield and utilize Haaland's clinical finishing

prediction.reasoning: Arsenal showing little weakness at Emirates this season, City's title credentials being tested
